What's Trending ?

A user-friendly dashboard that provides real-time data and insights on layoff trends, statistics, and patterns across various sectors. For ex, In Tech(Saas) industry, what skills, languages, technologies are used currently by working employees.

Join the powerfull community

Let's navigate the storm together by connecting with employees around the globe. A platform for members to engage in discussions and share thoughts related to your industry. Access to curated news articles and insights on layoff trends and patterns, to help users stay informed about the latest developments in the job market.

Real-time Tracking

In-depth analysis of layoff trends and patterns, including information on the industries, regions, and companies most affected by layoffs. Recruiters can connect to the laid-off employees and also can explore the open-job opportunities
